author: bird___.
content:
Are yaml schemas for the execution engine api available anywhere or generatable somehow? I know it says here (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/tree/main/src/engine)
> This API is in active development and currently specified in markdown documents specified by fork scopes (Paris, Shanghai). A schema will follow once the specification stabilizes.
But is there some fork somewhere or a client that is using some spec in some data format that I could use?
